messages.subject: Check out JS Online: Parents have power over Pokemon

messages.messageBody:
This is an interesting article on Pokemon. I know everyone has their own
POV so I'm not trying to start a discussion on this. We have had to ban
Pokemon from our home as it was causing real problems. They are allowed to
keep what they have but no more buying. This is to save our sanity. I was
glad to see we aren't the only ones who felt this way.
<A
HREF="http://www.jsonline.com/lifestyle/advice/dec99/mitccol05120299a.asp">Cli
ck here: JS Online: Parents have power over Pokemon</A>

Laura
